p: In order to evaluate the application of the African NP database, we applied a substructure search for molecules having a methylthiol moiety (chemical formula; CH 3SH and canonical SMILES; CS). The existence of several thiol based HDAC inhibitors such as romidepsin and largazole (both prodrugs that generate the thiol in vivo) supports our idea to find molecules that possess sulphur containing functional groups from our database that can be used as a ZBG in the development of HDAC inhibitors (Figure 11).
